name: Epic Cargo Truck Driver: Extreme Deluxe Transport
name_original: Epic Cargo Truck Driver: Extreme Deluxe Transport
description:
Various kind of Cargo from one place to another successfully.Show your skills as the extreme pro trucker to drive heavy duty transporter truck carrying cargo, luggage, logs and cars. Be careful on dangerous twists and turns and deliver cargo safely.
Extreme weather conditions with rainfalls and lighting could make your drive even more difficult. Let's start heavy engine, drive real cargo truck and feel the power of heavy engine with furious jungle and city drive of high traffic. Drive safe and transport goods to its destination. This cargo game addictive you which bound you to play this game for several hours. With this thrilling game you can simulate 4x4 offroad and city drive experience on same time. Collect cargo from extreme roadless jungle and deliver it to city. Let the trailer car truck game fun begin! 100% free truck simulation.

Epic Cargo Simulator Features:
* Various Different Environments and Vehicles
* Realistic Truck Driver Environment
* Wood Transporter Cargo Delivery
* On-Screen Steering Wheel
* Acceleration Pedal + Brake Pedal
* Extreme road trip.
* HD graphics stunning Sound effects.
* Easy Control and game play.
* Realistic physics truck
* Realistic damage
* Real Time driving simulation
* Best game to enjoy

How to Play:
* Use on screen accelerator to speed up the truck
* Use Steering for control
* Use Break to stop the vehicle
* Avoid hurdles and collisions to reach safely
